option.name: clangTidyChecks
option.value: -*, bugprone-*, google-*, misc-*, modernize-*, performance-*, portability-*, readability-*, -google-readability-braces-around-statements, -google-runtime-references, -misc-non-private-member-variables-in-classes, -modernize-use-trailing-return-type, -modernize-avoid-c-arrays, -performance-move-const-arg, -readability-braces-around-statements, -readability-magic-numbers, -readability-named-parameter, -readability-redundant-declaration, -readability-uppercase-literal-suffix
